page.title: 01MY DAY
page.content:
MY DAY ________ I get up at 7. o'clock in the morning and go downstairs for my breakfast a cereal and a cup of tea. Having washed and changed, my mother takes my brother and I to school. I wait for my friends by the gate. When the bell rings we go into our lines and file into school. Having kept my coat and bag I settle down to the morning's work which includes English and Welsh. . At playtime we play rounders and and very often we see the Mountain Rescue helicopter flying above us to answer a distress call in the nearby mountains.
During the afternoon we do project work about the locality and our school garden.
